title: Netherlands : average annual salary and bonuses 2018
summary: This statistic shows the Annual of average annual in the Netherlands between 2018 and 26 , 2018 salary presence of Yearly_wage_including_bonuses indicators of 2018 Yearly_wage_including_bonuses Bonuses_and_allowances .
In 34670€ cases out of a total of 118 reported average annual , the 2018 ( s ) displayed Yearly_wage_including_bonuses of .

data.Salaries: Additional tax liability for company car

gold: This statistic displays the average annual salary in the Netherlands in 2018 , in euros . It shows that the average employee , next to an annual salary of roughly 20,100 euros , also received an additional 4,600 euros in special payments . Together , the combined yearly salary in the Netherlands was approximately 34,700 euros .
